row.entry: This is an standard UnSharp Mask (USM) tool for sharpening the details of an image.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: This module works by enhancing the contrast around edges and thereby enhances the impression of sharpness of an image. In darktable this module is only applied to the L-channel in Lab color space.

sect5.title: radius
sect5.para: USM applies a gaussian blur to your image as part of its algorithm. This controls the blur radius which in turn defines the spatial extent of edge enhancement. Too high values will lead to ugly over-sharpening.

sect5.title: amount
sect5.para: This controls the strength of the sharpening.

sect5.title: threshold
sect5.para: Contrast differences below this threshold are excluded from sharpening. Use this to avoid amplification of noise.
